Description: Four curvaceous bombshells find love and romance in a delightful collection that features Donna Hill's Over the Rainbow, in which full-figured restaurateur Jessica Morgan finds the man of her dreams when she poses for a plus-size magazine, as well as other works by Brenda Jackson, Monica Jackson, and Francis Ray.
